thread.title: Ground News - Sombre Christmas Eve in Bethlehem as Gaza war rages
thread.title_full: Ground News - Sombre Christmas Eve in Bethlehem as Gaza war rages

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Sombre Christmas Eve in Bethlehem as Gaza war rages
text:
Summary by Ground News The Latin Patriarch of Jerusalem led a Christmas procession to the city of Bethlehem in the occupied West Bank on Sunday. The procession was much smaller than previous years, with Cardinal Pierbattista Pizzaballa only being accompanied by some Franciscan monks and a handful of other believers. Bethlehem is usually visited by tens of thousands of international pilgrims around Christmas. Share menu More
Filters 2 Articles 2 Articles All Left Center Right
RTÉ Center High Factuality Government: Government of Ireland Sombre Christmas Eve in Bethlehem as Gaza war rages A pall of gloom descended over Bethlehem on Christmas Eve as the Gaza war weighed heavily on the biblical city in the occupied West Bank and the usual crowds of pilgrims stayed away.
